title: Poster, "The wise man looks into space..."
inscribed: Imprinted in white ink, lower right: Decision/Making/Information / Santa Ana, California and Washington, D.C.
description: A large grid of bright colors: yellow, pink, purple, orange and reds. Text in white, lower right: The wise man looks into space / and does not regard the small as too little, / nor the great as too big; / for he knows that there is no limit to dimensions.

participants.person_name: Jann Church Advertising & Graphic Design, Inc.

tombstone.epitaph: Poster, "The wise man looks into space...". Lithograph on paper. Gift of Various Donors. 1981-29-15.
